domain.title:
Commercial/
Regulatory compliance
domain.text:
Our attorneys have comprehensive knowledge of international and Serbian contract law, standard agreement clauses and industry customs in most business sectors. We advise, analyze and provide legal opinions, support clients in negotiations, draft agreements, general terms of business and other business documents. We assist clients in tackling the maze of legislation while assigning priority to the compliance of their operations with the Serbian regulations.
    We draft contract manufacturing and purchasing agreements, agreement on international sales of goods, loan agreements, consultancy and services agreements, distribution, agency, intermediary and franchise agreements, joint venture agreements, agreements in the field of freight and other commercial contracts.
    Our attorneys provide counseling regarding customs regulations, foreign exchange operations and payment transactions and services.
